spells.name: Aid
spells.description: +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear, 1d8 temporary hp +1/level (max +10).

spells.name: Align Weapon
spells.description: Weapon becomes good, evil, lawful, or chaotic.

spells.name: Augury
spells.description: Learns whether an action will be good or bad.

spells.name: Bear's Endurance
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Con for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Bull's Strength
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Calm Emotions
spells.description: Calms creatures, negating emotion effects.

spells.name: Consecrate
spells.description: Fills area with positive energy, weakening undead.

spells.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
spells.description: Cures 2d8 damage + 1/level (max +10).

spells.name: Darkness
spells.description: 20-ft. radius of supernatural shadow.

spells.name: Death Knell
spells.description: Kills dying creature; you gain 1d8 temporary hp, +2 to Str, and +1 caster level.

spells.name: Delay Poison
spells.description: Stops poison from harming target for 1 hour/level.

spells.name: Desecrate
spells.description: Fills area with negative energy, making undead stronger.

spells.name: Eagle's Splendor
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Cha for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Enthrall
spells.description: Captivates all within 100 ft. + 10 ft./level.

spells.name: Find Traps
spells.description: Notice traps as a rogue does.

spells.name: Gentle Repose
spells.description: Preserves one corpse.

spells.name: Hold Person
spells.description: Paralyzes one humanoid for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Inflict Moderate Wounds
spells.description: Touch attack, 2d8 damage + 1/level (max +10).

spells.name: Make Whole
spells.description: Repairs an object.

spells.name: Owl's Wisdom
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Remove Paralysis
spells.description: Frees creatures from paralysis or slow effect.

spells.name: Resist Energy
spells.description: Ignores 10 (or more) points of damage/attack from specified energy type.

spells.name: Restoration, Lesser
spells.description: Dispels magical ability penalty or repairs 1d4 ability damage.

spells.name: Shatter
spells.description: Sonic vibration damages objects or crystalline creatures.

spells.name: Shield Other
spells.description: You take half of subject's damage.

spells.name: Silence
spells.description: Negates sound in 20-ft. radius.

spells.name: Sound Burst
spells.description: Deals 1d8 sonic damage to subjects; may stun them.

spells.name: Spiritual Weapon
spells.description: Magic weapon attacks on its own.

spells.name: Status
spells.description: Monitors condition, position of allies.

spells.name: Summon Monster II
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Undetectable Alignment
spells.description: Conceals alignment for 24 hours.

spells.name: Zone of Truth
spells.description: Subjects within range cannot lie.
